sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SYMPOSIARCH, in antiquity, the director or manager of an entertainment. This office was ſometimes performed by the perſon at whoſe charge the entertainment was provided ; ſometimes by another named by him ; and at other times, eſpecially in entertainments provided at the common expence, he was elected by lot, or by the ſuffrages of the gueſts.
